title: K-12 Mobile-Based Educational Software Evaluation Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and proficiency in mobile device usage
context.additional_context: Focusing on practical exercises for developing evaluation criteria in smartphone-only limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: One can explain the five core criteria for evaluating educational software quality: content accuracy, interactivity, accessibility, technical stability, and educational effectiveness.
One can create an evaluation checklist for science-based educational software and incorporate peer feedback.
One can summarize software evaluation results in mobile environments using data visualization tools (graphs/tables) and present them.

resources: 5 Types of Sample Software for Science Education
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
